>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/message/sendAudio"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Envía audio o PTT (push-to-talk).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["number","audio"],"properties":{"number":{"type":"string","example":"51987654321"},"audio":{"type":"string","description":"URL o base64 del audio"},"ptt":{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"true = enviar como nota de voz"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Audio enviado","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
